text: 12.10 Apo 2.4, Lom 12.6, 1 Ko 14.5, 14.29, 1 Jo 4.1 Kawnan ne nokom ak binɨb olap nop kɨles ñek, tap mageptek okok gup, binɨb olap nop kɨles ñek, God gos ñeb takaw ak agñub, binɨb olap nop kɨles ñek, God Kawnan ne wog ak akaŋ, kɨcheki wog ak tɨg asɨkɨl nɨgtep gup. Pen Kawnan ne nokom ak binɨb olap nop kɨles ñek, takaw yɨbɨl keke agup, binɨb olap nop kɨles ñek, takaw yɨbɨl keke agel nɨŋɨd, tɨg adɨkɨl agñub.
